option.name: typeNames
option.title: Externally defined type names
option.help: Comma-separated list of typedefs defined outside the source but referred to within (just to pass the syntax check)

option.name: redundantNames
option.title: Redundant pre-processor names or macros
option.help: Comma-separated list of names or macros (with empty parentheses) to be ignored on parsing

option.name: use_WINAPI_defines
option.title: Use type names and defines from WINAPI
option.help: Enable this if the source file refers to many WINAPI type names or dummy defines like WINAPI

option.name: use_MinGw_defines
option.title: Use type names and defines from MinGw
option.help: Enable this if the source file refers to many MinGw type names or dummy defines

option.name: debugLines
option.title: Import Debug lines as valid code
option.help: Select this to import debug lines as valid code, otherwise they will be converted to comments "DEBUG ...".

option.name: decimalComma
option.title: Decimal comma (instead of decimal point)
option.help: Select this if decimal and float literals are written with decimal comma instead of decimal point in the code.

option.name: fixedForm
option.title: Fixed-form format
option.help: Select this if the source file is in fixed-form reference format, otherwise free-form will be assumed.

option.name: fixedColumnIndicator
option.title: Indicator column in fixed format
option.help: Number of the indicator column (in fixed format; default: 7).

option.name: fixedColumnText
option.title: Column of ignored text in fixed format
option.help: Column number where the so-called Program Name Area begins (in fixed format; default: 73).

option.name: convert_syntax
option.title: Convert declarations etc. to Pascal/Structorizer style
option.help: This setting slightly raises the chance of executability and re-export in Structorizer

option.name: convert_syntax
option.title: Convert declarations etc. to Pascal/Structorizer style
option.help: This setting slightly raises the chance of executability and re-export in Structorizer
